channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Why LVMH’s $1 billion Formula One bet is more than the average luxury partnership
item.description: As well as a timekeeper, Tag Heuer became the first title sponsor for the Monaco Grand Prix this year.

item.title: It hasn’t been this hard to find a used car since the height of COVID
item.description: Tariffs drive people away from new cars, creating a shortage on used car lots.

item.title: Faith and Credit
item.description: We try to demystify the bond market.

item.title: Menopause startup Midi Health launches a longevity platform for women who want to be ‘healthy grandmothers’
item.description: Longevity isn't just for men trying to live to 150.

item.title: In New Jersey Wrestling, a High School Fight Goes Out of Bounds
item.description: When opposing fans taunted a wrestling star, he and his father fought back. The clash lay bare the intensity of competition, and parental interference...

item.title: What to Know About the Liverpool FC Parade Car Crash
item.description: Almost 50 people, including four children, were injured on Monday after a driver plowed into a crowd that had been celebrating Liverpool F.C.’s Premie...

item.title: More U.S. consumers than last year say they prefer gas-powered vehicles over electric or hybrid
item.description: Tariffs are having a significant effect on consumers’ auto purchase decisions.

item.title: Indeed’s CEO shares the unusual question he’s been asking job candidates for 15 years: Apple or Android?
item.description: CEOs at TripAdvisor, StockX, Wisp, and CTA have their own make-or-break questions for job-seekers—like how many degrees separate the minute and hour h...

item.title: Zelensky Is Expected in Berlin as Merz Steps Forward as Key Backer of Ukraine
item.description: A likely focus of talks between the two leaders will be military aid and whether Germany will provide Ukraine with the Taurus cruise missile.

item.title: Congo’s Former President Returns Home, Accused of Treason

item.title: Another Suspect Is Arrested in Bitcoin Kidnapping and Torture Case

item.title: Israeli Forces Said They Killed a ‘Terrorist.’ He Was 14 Years Old.

item.title: How the Liverpool Parade Car Crash Unfolded
item.description: After a car plowed into crowds celebrating their team’s Premier League title, camaraderie and jubilation dissolved into dread.
